name: Get Together (Kenneth Wilson)
description:
GMTK Jam 2021 game entry, with the theme being "Joined Together"

Get Together involves getting two guinea pigs back together by going through several puzzles while making sure each don't miss seeing each other.

Can be played single player, or co-op with the same keyboard. Takes about a few minutes to beat.

Developed by a single person team, the first time attempting a solo development for a game jam.
